column4: guys,sorry to ask but i need some phpmyadmin related help,anyone around with such knowledge?
does anybody know how to install phpmyadmin?
it's accessed via a web page
or copy myphpadmin folder from "standard" doc root to new doc root
dpkg -L phpadmin | less  will list where the files were installed
which one to copy over to doc root?
well one of them has a bunch of .php files...
both locs include php files in them :S
yes,i just guessed when copying over folder and was correct with my selection
